description: Daub's Frosted Juniper (tree form) is a stunning choice for landscaping. This evergreen conifer has an especially attractive form, with silvery-blue foliage and a compact, cone-shaped crown. Its slow growth rate makes it perfect for smaller yards with limited space, though it can also be trimmed and maintained in a coiffed style. Its needles are also resistant to damage by wind, cold and salt, making it a perfect choice for beachfront areas. In late winter, its flowers appear as clusters of yellow-green fruits. All in all, Daub's Frosted Juniper is a beautiful and hardy choice for gardeners looking for a low-maintenance, durable tree.
